expand.name: expand
expand.description: Expands an array into separate records.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The field definition used to expand records

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of elements is limited by the limit parameter or the length of the array

fieldsFlatten.name: fieldsFlatten
fieldsFlatten.description: Extracts/flattens fields from a nested record.
syntax: fieldsFlatten expression [, prefix] [, fields: { [field, â€¦] }] [, depth]

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: An identifier returning the record from which to flatten the fields.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: Prefix that is applied to all fields that are going to be flattened out. It can't be used together with the fields parameter. Default: The provided field name and a dot.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Flatten nested records until the specified depth is reached. Must be between 1 and 10. The default value is 1.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Fields from the record that are going to be flattened out. It can't be used together with the prefix parameter.
